summary: The diff successfully implements all requested dropdown styling requirements. The changes include: (1) Royal Teal CSS variable definition in index.css for both light and dark modes, (2) comprehensive dropdown/select styling rules targeting Radix UI components and native select elements with Royal Teal background and white text, (3) Royal Teal color token added to Tailwind config matching the CSS variable value. All hover, focus, and selected states maintain white text visibility as required.
